reviewText: This maybe the only way one can watch coverage of the WRC. Too bad one has to buy the series piecemeal rather than having the series available on one DVD. Guess that means bigger profits for the producer! Which aslo becomes difficult to track which events are covered and which ones aren't.
The WRC is in my mind the finest racing on this planet. I look forward to view 2008 and hope to obtain it from Amazon.
